author: davidschor
title: Brick shaped Ice
review: This is just a great little novelty.  Make these ice cubes for a special occasion, or use them every day.  Flexible design is dishwasher safe, too!  Need a platform for your hoth battles?  This could fill the bill.  Also great with your favorite spirits.

author: ra226
title: Works great for chocolate, too!
review:
We made chocolate Lego bricks from these for our wedding and they worked great!  I assume they can make ice cubes, too...

Aside from that, what else can I say--they're ice cube trays.  They make ice cubes.  And chocolates, as noted.
